article_title: Alaska Republicans overplay an old hand and pay at the polls
article_text: The strategy brought in a disproportionate number of men, even as women, seeing Democrats more willing to do for them what Johnson had done for blacks, shifted into a Democratic demographic. What Republican leaders failed to see was that increased voting by blacks and other minorities would eventually balance the additional white male vote. Also, a young, new generation was not as comfortable with the racial tinge of hard-right radicalism. As a proportion of the whole electorate, the radical right has shrunk since the tea party was founded.

article_metadata.description: OPINION: Alaska's GOP follows the national party script, and that has helped clinch election victories for independent Bill Walker and Democrat Ethan Berkowitz.

og.description: OPINION: Alaska's GOP follows the national party script, and that has helped clinch election victories for independent Bill Walker and Democrat Ethan Berkowitz.
og.title: Alaska Republicans overplay an old hand and pay at the polls

article_summary:
What Republican leaders failed to see was that increased voting by blacks and other minorities would eventually balance the additional white male vote.
As a proportion of the whole electorate, the radical right has shrunk since the tea party was founded.
Also, a young, new generation was not as comfortable with the racial tinge of hard-right radicalism.
The strategy brought in a disproportionate number of men, even as women, seeing Democrats more willing to do for them what Johnson had done for blacks, shifted into a Democratic demographic.
